page.title: 19RECREATION IN ASHBY MAGNA
page.content:
Recreational pursuits are mostly enjoyed outside the area. Spectator sports such as rugby, football, motor racing are sports that some villagers regularly support. Squash is played in nearby clubs and Leisure Centres.
Keep fit classes are well attended and the Women's Institute arrange short winter evening classes in flower arranging, basket making and cane work, and in the past handicrafts and cake icing.
Gardening is a past time most inhabitants indulge in culminating in a very competitive village Flower and Vegetable Show in August.
Villagers often meet in the Chequers Pub for a drink or a bar snack in a traditional 'Country Inn' atmosphere.
